eng: Why did you do that to her, Tom? She loved you!

toki: tenpo suno ni la jan ala li kama tawa pali.
mi wile weka e jan Ton tan lawa.
jan Ton li esun e kasi kule.
jan Ton li pini sitelen li weka e ilo sitelen lon supa.
eng: Tom quit writing and put down his pen.

toki: jan Mali li toki e lon ala tawa mije ona.
jan Ton li toki e lon ala tawa meli ona.
